content.rendered:
Why you should apply online?

  • You can apply for a visa from the comfort of your home.
  • You can make cashless payments
  • You can upload your documents
  • You can arrange your passport and other documents pick up
  • You can avoid visiting office dealing with heavy traffic

 

Apply Online-

  • Register your profile in VISAThing’s visa application system within 2 minutes.
  • Follow the simple steps and fill in all your necessary information to apply for a visa.

 

Payment-

  • You can make payments directly from the website using an online payment gateway which supports almost all the payment methods.
  • You can also choose to make payments directly to our counters while visiting our office.
  • Once the payment is successfully completed, you will be able to upload documents schedule a convenient time for your passport and other documents to be picked up from your location.
  • Alternatively, you can submit all the documents at our counters while visiting our office

 

Receive Your Visa-

  • Now that you’ve applied and paid for your visa application, You can take your passport and the progress of your service’s processing from your dashboard.
  • Once a decision is taken by the visa office, receive delivery of your visa stickered passport within the shortest time.
